item.title: Awareness: Wake Up to Life
item.description: Here is some notes from Anthony de Mello’s program Awareness: Wake Up To Life, New York, 1986. CD 1 On waking up All mystics agree: all is well. If you don’t see it, you are asleep. People don’t want to be cured, they want relief. Cure (waking up) is painful. Wise guru will never attempt to wake people up. Will I be able to help you I don’t expect neither to help nor to damage you.
